title: Find Nearest Public Restroom
description: A tourist uses a city information kiosk to find the nearest available public restroom.

tasks.description: Receive a request from a kiosk for the nearest public restroom.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system gets the kiosk's location.

tasks.description: Query the public asset database for all 'Public Restroom' assets, filtering for those that are currently 'Open' and not 'Out of Service'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system retrieves a list of available restrooms.

tasks.description: Display a map on the kiosk screen showing the route to the nearest available restroom.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system provides the user with clear directions.
